title: HUD update heads to ranked with 5.15

replies.body:
Why is it going to ranked? you said when it went live on normals:
"**If** all’s well with the update, we’ll push it over to ranked queues in a few days."
with all the huge negative feedback about it on all servers who after seeing that decided that "all is well"??
people don't like it, some do and thats great but some really don't, so at least have an option to toggle between the two. at least until everyone is satisfied with the new one, please.
I really like the new HUD and prefer it over the old one, but i still think the old one should be an option.{{item:3069}}

in the old HUD i used alert-pings on minimap all the time with holding right mousebutton and drag to the right alertping. Now that's not possible anymore. I tried it with adjusting keybinds. But it,s not possible. using keybord and mouse for alertpings just sucks... RIOT can you fix that?
But not everyone is satisfied with the old one. That's a very weird line of reasoning.
i didnt like the new hud to start off with because i didnt know where everything went. once i got used to it i started to like it even though i sometimes forget where the scores are of the screen

"until everyone is satisfied with the new one"
If they do allow us to toggle between them then not everyone will be satisfied, they will just keep using the old instead

They say they keep evolving the new one, so people can use the old one and then switch when the new one comes up to a standard that they feel comfortable with, but of course they don't have to switch at all if they don't want to.
Then Riot would've wasted their time trying to make a new HUD for us if no one's gonna use it......at least appreciate what they're trying to do, and just get over it

in the old HUD i used alert-pings on minimap all the time with holding right mousebutton and drag to the right alertping. Now that's not possible anymore. I tried it with adjusting keybinds. But it,s not possible. using keybord and mouse for alertpings just sucks... RIOT can you fix that?
Would like to create skinned huds with champions when you hit level 5 mastery and have a different background on your bit of the scoreboard xD

I doubt Riot would even care to add in an option just because of you.

'oh my gawd dis random person on the internet wants me to put hud customisation in the game, I better do it before he does sumthing to me'

It was a critical suggestion. That kind of thing is how things improve; company's should be listening to suggestions from the people using their product because their input shows what the players want, and at the end of the day without player Riot is nothing.  

I understand the problem with all the "omg I hate the new hud give me the old one back" complaints, but considering Beakers one is constructive I don't see a problem with it.
never mind, didn't see his other comment that I now realise you were referencing, my bad
Finally they added a crit stat in the new HUD
Thank you riot for putting the kda and cs in the top right again. That was really annoying me
I think the new HUD is awesome it only need a few changes.

why all the negative feedback for the new HUD its amazing <3 so much better than the old one and its so much cleaner and less all over the place, tho please mention how to check certain stats eg fps or lifesteal etc took ages to figure out

It's a bit squished, and people with colour issues or vision issues can have a bit of trouble differentiating between everything.

It also isn't very clear, OOM and CD are the same sound/visual look, etc. Hilariously enough for a while there it was also a bit too in your face, the flashy visual and audio cues were distracting and defeated the entire point of a clean and compressed HUD.

Personally I feel it has the opposite problem compared to before. Pre-update was all over the place with too much "whitespace", so to speak, while post-update was far too compressed for it's own good. Actually what LoL really needs is a new engine with all the "latest" features, like the ability to mix and match the HUD to personally suit, swap between different background music, enable VOIP, etc. Barring that, a HUD that is a bit more background and a bit clearer.

thats where people disagree? i think it looks messy, all over the place, not neat at all, barely any contrast, they took out the champions names too which i thought was a really good feature when you press tab. it makes the game seem less like vsing bots.

Most of you people need to seriously consider learning to appreciate new changes in a game.

As technology moves forward, things become "outdated".
Look at some of the Champion updates, we'll use the Gangplanks update as a fine example:
Gangplank had been released for several years adding minor balances and that might have been it. Eventually everything was receiving updates except him, and so the same can be applied to the HUD update, and the Client Update. 
Does it change the way you play the game or use the client? No, it has all the functions (AND more) released for it.
Get over the fact that you can't all get your way, shit, given with your already sparse learning space for improvement you probably can't learn and appreciate new things and would result in abusing the new content

what a dumb comparison...majority of the people liked the gp update. Majority of the people DONT like this new hud. Its terrible, its like cramming way too much into the screen all at once. Sometimes simple is better. 

Also, the HUD update affects the gameplay much more than the GP update. They could have kept the old HUD style, but added a few tweaks here and there instead of changing the whole thing and moving items to the right.

this is why I said we need a customizable HUD the new look is great but with    being   able   to   move    a   realistically    non     interactive  score board/inventory to a players preferred screen position is optimal.
it's not good. I think that last HUD is better. This HUD is too confusing when I want to know about kill, death, minion kills.
I'm finished with League of Legends until they make option for old HUD to come back.
love it can't wait for it to go to rank :)

please just give us the option to toggle between the old and new HUD, that way you are meeting the player base half way so everyone is happy not just force it on everyone. you kind of are on the right track with letting people toggle between SR music and the horrible new one so now just do that with the HUD.

THE NEW HUD IS terrible {{item:3073}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} please do not put it in ranked queues its so hard to play with and completely changes the screen scaling to a point were i cant even play. give us an option to switch between the two so i never have to use the new one

I doubt Riot would even care to add in an option just because of you.

'oh my gawd dis random person on the internet wants me to put the old hud back, I better do it before he does sumthing to me'

You are only one person out of a whole riot. If I was working with Riot I wouldn't even care to even look at your comment.

"You are only one person out of a whole riot." is this your first time on the internet? 
This new hud has recieved more bad feedback than it has good. A lot of people actually want the option to change HUDs, heck even some pros said that they don't like the new hud.
Good job listening to feedback Riot! Might aswell play Dota...
That's funny, because their huds are customisable. :P

Really? Riot please i've gotten used to the new UI but please take into consideration the amount of negative feedback you have gotten from it.
I think it's a bad idea moving it to ranked without the option of changing it at least.

I myself would just at least like the option to go back to the old UI

Is there a player poll like there was/is in RS for this game? So the playerbase can help Riot decide what projects the community actually wants, instead of Riot squeezing out garbage updates that maybe 3 people asked for. The majority don't want the HUD, and the arguments "you'll get used to it"/"just appreciate Rito's efforts" are irrel and stupid and miss the point. All we really need though is the ability to choose the old one, it's been fine for 4 years for me, and doesn't need to change.

Holy God the new HUD is awful. If you want to implement it, that's fine - BUT LET PEOPLE HAVE OPTIONS, forcing me to play with a HUD that I find so ineffective will make me not want to play the game at all. I just spent $20 and I'm starting to regret it after this....
New HUD is prettier yeh. but its way too bloody cluttered and difficult to quickly find the information you need.

I **Personally** don't like the _**New Interface**_. and its **hard** to find the champions and who play them at a **quick** glance when pressing tab. (**earlier** one **displayed much bigger** and with the name) now need to hover the mouse point on champions to see who play it....

Its **hard to identify** the champion who is dead with the cool down timer on the icon since the **champion icon is small**..

To see the stats of the champion **earlier** it was **clearly stated**. Armor, life steal,movement speed, etc now we need to press C to check the stats and **can't figure out** at a glance what they are without the mouse pointer on them.

Well this is **My Personal Opinion.**

Why do you have to put the CS KDA and team KDA back to top right? Can't you have an option to leave it near the minimap? I was so happy that that was going to happen, but now the internet, being the internet ruined the greatest thing that was going to happen. Can't you guys please have an option to choose from top right to bottom left? thank you
because u r not smart enough lol
hi plz accept my friend request u loser, thx for making the team lose, will see you soon
Well...time to move onto a different game
Funny when you guys think you're entitled to something even though its a free game.

i feel the option for the Old HUD to be possible, if not the ability to move sections of the HUD. E.G. the fact that all the info in the bottom left has been moved. can we customize it to be back there instead of tacked on to the centre HUD section

Also in 5.15 patch notes Riot states:
"We're making our first update pass on the new HUD based off of player feedback"

Based of player feedback?  its been mostly negative or asked for either customization or choice for old HUD.

NOOOOOO this HUD is shittttt?

same old same old
"IT'S NEW AND I DON'T UNDERSTAND IT THEREFORE I DON'T LIKE IT!!"
personally after a few matches i got used to it and really see the benefits of the new HUD, so I can't wait for it to be blanketed. 

Thanks Riot :)

replies.poster: OoO C U N T OoO
replies.body:
there should be a toggle button for this new HUD. So people that like it can use it, and people that don't like it don't have to suffer. everyone wins 
!!!
One problem I have with the new HUD is that the shop isn't re-sizable and as I play on a smaller screen than my desktop screen it overlaps with the bar on the bottom and causes all kinds of problems.

Riot as you can see from the comments down below, not all people appreciates the new HUD however we understand that you guys have spend a tonne of time on the new HUD hoping that the players might enjoy it, however that has backfired and the reason being the HUD is a completely different to the old HUD and we're not used to the new layout as we do to the old one, however we're still adapting towards that new HUD but for the time being can you please make an option for us to use the old one? Since trying to adapt the new one would take a reasonable amount of time. If possible though it would be great if the HUD was changed and rework the layout similar to the old one and maybe even change the colour of it because me personally I don't like the colour.
